sections.heading: remedies available.The Nebraska Construction Prompt Pay Act shall not modify the remedies available to any person under the terms of a contract in existence prior to October 1, 2010, or by any other statute

sections.text:
45-1206.Other remedies available.

The Nebraska Construction Prompt Pay Act shall not modify the remedies available to any person under the terms of a contract in existence prior to October 1, 2010, or by any other statute.

SourceLaws 2010, LB552, ยง 6.
